mapper.insert: insert into tbl_report(report_no, plt_no, def_no, report_code, report_type) values(seq_report_no.nextval, #{plt_no}, #{def_no}, #{report_code}, #{report_type})
mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_report where report_state = '6-001' and report_date >= ( select to_char(sysdate -1, 'YYYY-MM-DD') from dual) and report_date <= sysdate
select count(*) from tbl_report where report_type = '6-012' and report_date >= ( select to_char(sysdate -1, 'YYYY-MM-DD') from dual) and report_date <= sysdate
select count(*) from tbl_report where report_type = '6-013' and report_date >= ( select to_char(sysdate -1, 'YYYY-MM-DD') from dual) and report_date <= sysdate
select count(*) from tbl_report where report_type = '6-012'
select count(*) from tbl_report where report_type = '6-013'
select count(*) from tbl_report where report_state = '6-002'

select r.*, p.acc_name plt_name, d.acc_name def_name, c.code_detail report_detail, c1.code_detail state_detail, c2.code_detail type_detail from tbl_report r inner join view_account p on r.plt_no = p.acc_no inner join view_account d on r.def_no = d.acc_no inner join tbl_code c on r.report_code = c.code_no inner join tbl_code c1 on r.report_state = c1.code_no inner join tbl_code c2 on r.report_type = c2.code_no where report_state = '6-001'
